articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance of Art Squad of KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance of Art Squad of KPA Unit
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the art squad of KPA Unit 10215.
					 The art squad put on the stage narrative and song "I Cannot Live without Your Care", Oungum ensemble "Star of General", female solo and male chorus "We Started from Scratch" and other colorful numbers of diverse genres.
					
					 The performance truthfully represented the invincible might of the heroic Korean People's Army and the firm faith and will of the servicepersons to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution and firmly guarantee the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms. 
					
					 It fully demonstrated the proud appearance of the soldier-artistes instilling the ardent love for the Party and the leader, the country and the people into the servicepersons and creditably discharging their sacred mission as buglers in the era of Songun.
					
					 Kim Jong Il highly appreciated the successful performance given by the members of the art squad, expressing great satisfaction with the fact that they not only created successful art pieces of great cognitive and educational value vividly reflecting the inexhaustible mental power of the servicepersons but also staged them in a unique and militant manner. 
					
					 He set forth important tasks that would serve as guidelines for further intensifying the revolutionary and militant performing activities.
					
					 Among the audience were KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the army and Secretary Kim Ki Nam, department directors Jang Song Thaek, Pak Nam Gi, Choe Ik Gyu and Kim Yang Gon and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Statue and Grave of Kang Pan Sok
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Statue and Grave of Kang Pan Sok
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the statue of Kang Pan Sok, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and outstanding leader of the Korean women's movement, in the Chilgol Revolutionary Site and her grave in Mangyongdae on April 21 on the occasion of her 117th birth anniversary.
					 Seen standing before the statue and grave were wreaths sent by Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The wreath-laying ceremonies were attended by Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Yong Rim and leading officials of organs of party, armed forces, power and working people's organizations, officials of ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and working people in the city.
					
					 Wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet were placed there.
					
					 Placed there then were wreaths in the name of working people's organizations, ministries, educational and public health and press institutions and revolutionary schools and party and power organs and farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to her, looking back on the brilliant life and exploits of the mother who gave birth to President Kim Il Sung as the sun of the nation, ushered in a new era of the women's movement in Korea and dedicated herself to the victory of the revolution.

articles.title: New Feature Film Produced
articles.content:
New Feature Film Produced
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Feature film "A White Gem" (Part 1, 2) has been recently produced by the April 25 Film Studio of the DPRK. 
					 A film preview took place at the Taedongmun Cinema Tuesday.
					
					 The feature film was watched by senior officials of the party, army and state, chairpersons of the friendly parties, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, creators and artistes in the field of the movie industry and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 The film truthfully depicts the world of transparent ideological and moral spirit of a soldier who upeheld the leader of the revolution with pure mind like a white gem with anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter O Jin U who was boundlessly loyal to the party and the leader till the last moments of his life as a model.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il made sure that O wore a white dress in the sense that the conscience and obligation of a revolutionary soldier following President Kim Il Sung should be unblemished and pure and posed for a photograph with O in the same white dress as his. And he entrusted the most difficult task to O and always looked after his health with utmost care.
					
					 This helped O cherish deep in his heart the philosophical principle governing the revolutionary view on the leader and served as a nutritive element in his life and struggle.
					
					 The film has moving scenes showing the hero of the film leading commanding officers of the younger generation to display in the course of the struggle to accomplish the leader's cause the intense loyalty as pure as a white gem which remains shining even after it is broken and creditably fulfilling his duty and obligation as a veteran revolutionary.

articles.title: Relics of Grass Crafts Rich in National Flavor
articles.content:
Relics of Grass Crafts Rich in National Flavor
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of relics of grass crafts is open at the Korean Folklore Museum.
					On display are more than 100 pieces of relics belonging to the Ri Dynasty (1392-1910).
					
					They are classified into mats (rush-mat, cushion and others), tableware (nest of boxes for keeping food, bamboo strainer, tray made of bush-clover, terrapin-shaped bottle, wine cup, etc.), dresses (reed hat, rattan undershirt, wicker suitcase, etc.), farming tools (basket, deep round grain-basket woven of straw, etc.), room articles for daily use (fan and blind) and others. There are also bamboo and paper crafts.
					
					Drawing the attention of the visitors are such mats as sedge mats, reed mats, bulrush mats, rice straw mats and wild reed mats.
					
					Sedge mats with flower-patterns were very popular for their clean color and softness from olden times and they found their way to neighboring countries.
					
					Director of the folklore museum An Sun Chol told KCNA:
					
					The Korean people have made and used wonderful grass craft works through their creative activities and tireless efforts from long ago. 
					
					The relics of grass crafts on display now are mainly made of stalks, roots, barks and leaves of various plants such as sedge, bulrush, willow, bamboo, bush-clover, rice straw, reed and kaoliang.
					
					The exhibition will be open till October 31.

articles.title: Kang Pan Sok's Life Associated with Building of Revolutionary Armed Force
articles.content:
Kang Pan Sok's Life Associated with Building of Revolutionary Armed Force
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are recollecting with deep emotion the immortal feats of Kang Pan Sok, mother of Korea, who devoted her all for the motherland and people on the occasion of her birth  anniversary (April 21,1892).
					 Her life is unthinkable apart from the arms of revolution because she treasured them.
					
					 She was overjoyed at the foundation of the Anti-Japanese People's Guerilla Army more than any other else.
					
					 She secured weapons needed for the building of the revolutionary armed force at the risk of her life and made military uniforms and prepared military provisions together with members of the Women's Association, though she was ill.
					
					 Indeed, she made her every possible effort to help President Kim Il Sung in founding the revolutionary armed force.
					
					 Regarding arms as most valuable wealth and invincible precious sword, she left behind moving stories in the last days of her great life.
					
					 Upon hearing the news about her critical illness, the President dropped in at home prior to the expedition to south Manchuria.
					
					 She conversed with the President until after midnight. When mention was made of the family's livelihood or her health condition, she would hastily close the subject and shift the conversation to other topics. 
					
					 The topics were all issues related with armed activities--What would be the guerrilla army's course of action in the future? What was to be done at the guerrilla base?
					
					 She was a great teacher beyond the boundary of a family. She forcefully inspired the President, who was so worried about the illness of his mother, to the road of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, saying that he should think of the ruined nation and the people.
					
					 Today the Korean army and people, recollecting the revolutionary world outlook of Kang Pan Sok who thought of the motherland and people more than her family, are filled with the firm determination to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered in Mt. Paektu under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, true to the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: War Hysteria of U.S. and Lee Group of Traitors Flailed
articles.content:
War Hysteria of U.S. and Lee Group of Traitors Flailed
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Recently, the commander of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces present in south Korea flew aboard a fighter of the puppet forces while a brasshat of the puppet forces who is deputy commander of the south Korea-U.S. "combined forces command", made a similar flight aboard a fighter of the U.S. forces for the purpose of examining the "posture of air operation and capability carrying out combined operation". And they "exchanged visits" to units of the U.S. air force and the puppet air force, inciting the atmosphere of a war against the DPRK.
					 Commenting on this fact, Rodong Sinmun today says:
					
					 Such action is an unpardonable military provocation and a grave hostile act against the DPRK as it was designed to confirm the perfect posture of south Korea-U.S. combined operation for mounting a preemptive air attack in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula and boost their cooperation in the moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The "alliance" touted by the U.S. and the south Korean war hawks is, in essence, an alliance for war and aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are the dangerous bellicose forces seeking to escalate the tension of the Korean Peninsula and provoke a war against the DPRK under such deceptive signboards as "peace" and "stability" while the Lee Myung Bak group is an unpardonable gang of traitors which kowtows to foreign aggressor forces and unhesitatingly serves them in carrying out their scenario for a horrible nuclear war.
					
					 In order to prevent any disaster, it is urgent to root out its source.
					
					 The DPRK's invincible deterrent for self-defence will serve to decisively check and crush any military provocation of the bellicose forces inside and outside south Korea. 
					
					 The U.S. and the Lee group had better stop such reckless military moves, mindful that their military provocation to the DPRK is as foolish an act as jumping into fire with brushwood on one's back.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Establish the Monolithic Ideological System More Thoroughly Throughout the Party and Society" has served as a monumental work of great significance in the Korean revolution as it indicates revolutionary principles for establishing the monolithic ideological system of the Workers' Party of Korea and tasks and ways for taking the modeling of the whole society on the Juche Idea as a supreme programme of the party and realizing it.
					 Rodong Sinmun today says this in a signed article dedicated to the 35th anniversary of its publication. 
					
					 The period since its publication marked historic years during which a fresh turn has taken place in the work for establishing the monolithic ideological system of the party. 
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The wise leadership provided by Kim Jong Il for carrying forward and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche lies in that he has steadily developed the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung into an eternal guiding idea of the Korean revolution, consolidated the single-minded unity based on his revolutionary idea in every way and brought about great heydays of prosperity of the country in line with the President's idea and intention. 
					
					 It was Kim Jong Il who has inherited the idea of the President 100 per cent after solemnly declaring that no change should be expected from him. It was again Kim Jong Il who put up the slogan "Let Us Arm Ourselves More Firmly with the Revolutionary Ideas of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung!" as the main slogan of the party, fully imbuing all the people with the idea of the President only. 
					
					 The Juche idea, the Songun idea for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of the President has served as a cornerstone of the single-minded unity and that of the great unity between the army and people that he has developed and enriched in the struggle to establish the said system. 
					
					 Thanks to the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il a great leap forward is now reported from all fronts of socialist construction and the DPRK successfully launched the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 recently, a historic event that powerfully demonstrated the national power of the country, concludes the article.

articles.title: Fair Judgment on Solidarity Members Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Fair Judgment on Solidarity Members Called for in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea, the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, the People's Solidarity for Abrogation of the "National Security Law" and other civic and social organizations held a press conference in Seoul on April 17 to demand a fair judgment on the core members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration.
					 At the conference the speakers accused the prosecution of sentencing the said members to such heavy penalties as prison terms up to 9 years on April 3.
					
					 They declared that if the judicial authorities label activities for implementing the June 15 joint declaration as "enemy-benefiting" ones at the trial to be held on April 21 and brand the solidarity as an "enemy-benefiting organization," they will meet stronger resistance of the people.
					
					 A press release read out at the conference denounced the prosecution for labeling the activities of the members of the solidarity, a legitimate non-governmental reunification movement organization, "enemy-benefiting, illegal and spying acts" overnight.
					
					 The punishment imposed upon the core members of the solidarity is little short of judging the June 15 era by the yardstick dating back to the Cold War era, it said, accusing the prosecution of "acting a waiting maid of the Lee Myung Bak regime pursuing a policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen".

articles.title: Struggle for Democracy and Reunification Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Democracy and Reunification Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations in south Korea, including the Society of April Revolution and the Solidarity for Progress, held a joint memorial service in Seoul on April 19, the 49th anniversary of the April Popular Uprising. 
					 Speakers at the service said that they can not repress their astonishment at the reality in which the departed soul of the past dictatorial regime has been revived to swagger about in south Korea as Lee Myung Bak took office. 
					
					 They deplored that the inter-Korean relations, which had been developed favorably, have been rapidly deteriorated to put into such worst crisis that a military conflict may break out and the people's livelihood has been at stake due to the Lee Myung Bak "government's" economic politics for the rich only.
					
					 Noting that neither the police nor the authorities have made even a word of apology though evacuees were ruthlessly killed in the struggle for the right to existence, the speakers charged that everything--people's livelihood, democracy and inter-Korean relations--has been plunged into crisis under the Lee "government". 
					
					 The present developments, in which the spirit of the April 19 uprising for democratization of society and reunification is totally being violated, make the people keenly feel the need to turn out again in the struggle to overthrow the dictatorial "government" in the spirit of the April 19 uprising and the June resistance, they stated.
					
					 They called upon all the people to turn out in the struggle for democracy and reunification.

articles.title: End of Dictatorial Regime Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
End of Dictatorial Regime Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement on April 19 on the occasion of the 49th anniversary of the April Popular Uprising.
					 The statement noted that it is 49 years since the April 19 Popular Uprising but there is still in south Korea the same deplorable reality as that in the past dictatorial regime. 
					
					 The statement accused the Lee Myung Bak regime of pushing the living of the absolute majority of the people to the edge of precipice by enforcing a policy favorable for a tiny handful of money cliques and the rich only, adding that the grudge of the people against the brazen-faced authorities is mounting high. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Lee Myung Bak is cracking down upon the people and perpetrating brutal murder of protesters by using all powers. He has gone the lengths of organizing such white terrorist group as the "Northwest Young People's Association" which earned an ill-fame as a group of political gangsters under the control of Syngman Rhee in the past.
					
					 The group of sycophants and traitors have brought the south-north relations to a stalemate and further increased the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula, backed by the U.S. and Japanese warmongers.
					
					 It is hard to expect social progress and the happiness of the people and it is much more difficult to achieve reunification as long as U.S. imperialists and the Lee group are allowed to stay in south Korea.
					
					 The statement called on all the progressive forces to closely rally under the banner of "By our nation itself" and bring down the dictatorial regime without fail.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- Figures of Egypt and Syria in their statements issued on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung praised his undying feats.
					 Siham Ahmad Mugahed, chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, in a statement on April 10 said that Kim Il Sung's life was a life of the distinguished thinker and theoretician who founded the guiding idea in the era of independence and clearly indicated the path ahead of the Korean people and progressive humankind, the extraordinary strategist who defeated two imperialisms in one generation and ushered in a new upswing in the anti-imperialist struggle and the great statesman who built the DPRK where the centuries-old backwardness and poverty once prevailed into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					The idea, cause and personality of the President are being successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he said, adding that the history of the President is shedding ever brighter rays as the eternal treasure of socialist Korea and the human cause of independence.
					
					 Saber Ballul, department chief of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus, in a statement on April 7 said that the birth of the President provided the Korean nation with a ray of hope and the world people struggling against subjugation and submission with a beacon.
					
					 The statement recalled that the President founded the great Juche idea, the Songun idea which guides the world people to defend the sovereignty of their countries and the dignity of their nations.

articles.title: National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Pakistan
articles.content:
National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Pakistan
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the Juche idea was held in Karachi, Pakistan on April 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed in the venue of the seminar were works of the peerlessly great persons, photos showing their undying feats and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Present at the seminar were figures of the government, political parties and organizations of Sind Province of Pakistan and members of Juche idea study organizations and organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people.
					
					 Akrak Aktar Hamidi, chairman of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, in his opening address praised Kim Il Sung as the distinguished elder statesman who founded the immortal Juche idea and lightened the road ahead of the progressive humankind struggling for independence, thus performing the undying feats in accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the Juche idea are now being strikingly demonstrated in the DPRK, he noted.
					
					 The DPRK has become a model in the era of independence on which the progressive humankind is looking with admiration, he said, adding: This is the result of the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Il who is further developing and enriching the immortal Juche idea.
					
					 Javed Ansari, secretary general of the society, said in a speech that the Juche idea is the great guiding idea in the era of independence reflecting the requirements and desire not only of the Korean people but also of the progressive humankind.
					
					 A senator of Pakistan in his speech stressed that Kim Jong Il has not only developed in depth the immortal Juche idea steadily into the perfect guiding idea in the era of independence but also honorably defended the sovereignty and security of the DPRK with his ever-victorious Songun politics, embodiment of the Juche idea.
					
					A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
Pyongyang, April 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house of Russia on April 13.
					 The work, published on August 4, Juche 86 (1997), deals with the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in realizing the cause of national reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme for the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification. And it indicates the tasks and ways for realizing the cause of national reunification on the basis of the three charters.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion artistica de Unidad No. 10215
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion artistica de Unidad No. 10215
 Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la Unidad No. 10215 del EPC.
					  Los integrantes del grupo de propaganda artistica pusieron en la escena la narracion y cancion "No podemos vivir fuera de su regazo", la cancion de acompanamiento de Oungum "Estrella general", el solo femenino y coro masculino "Hemos comenzado de la nada" y otras piezas de diversos tipos.
					
					  A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes mostraron bien el invencible poderio del heroico EPC, la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de los militares del ejercito popular dispuestos a defender a riesgo de la vida la Direccion de la Revolucion y garantizar firmemente con armas la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista y la empresa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  Y demostraron con vigor el poderio de los artistas militares quienes siembran en el corazon de los militares el ardiente amor al Partido y el Lider, la patria y el pueblo y cumplen magnificamente la sagrada mision del trompetero de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					  El Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho de que los propagandistas artisticos de la unidad no solo crearon las excelentes obras de gran significacion cognoscitivo-educativa que reflejan vividamente la inagotable fuerza espiritual de los militares sino que tambien ofrecieron de modo vivaracho y combativo su funcion y evaluo altamente sus exitos.
					
					  El Comandante Supremo presento las tareas programaticas que sirven de guia para desarrollar aun mas las actividades de propaganda artistica, revolucionaria y combativa
					
					  Le acompanaron en verla los generales de ejercito del EPC Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su y otros miembros directivos del EPC, el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC Jang Song Thaek, Pak Nam Gi, Choe Ik Gyu y Kim Yang Gon y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Rinden homenaje a Kang Pan Sok por aniversario 117 de su nacimiento
articles.content:
Rinden homenaje a Kang Pan Sok por aniversario 117  de su nacimiento
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 117o aniversario del nacimiento de Kang Pan Sok, indoblegable combatiente revolucionaria y destacada dirigente del movimiento femenino coreano, fueron depositadas este martes las ofrendas florales ante su estatua de bronce en el Lugar Historico de la Revolucion de Chilgol y su tumba en Mangyongdae.
					En ambos lugares estaban colocadas las ofrendas florales enviadas por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC), Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC).
					
					En los actos de homenaje participaron Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Yong Rim, los cuadros directivos de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder y entidades de masas, funcionarios de los ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del EPC, asi como trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Fueron depositadas las ofrendas florales a nombre del CC del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC.
					
					Igualmente, fueron puestas alli las otras a nombre de las organizaciones de masas, ministerios, instituciones de ensenanza, salud publica y prensa, escuelas revolucionarias, los organismos del partido y el Poder, granjas en esta capital.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio recordando la brillante vida y las hazanas de Kang Pan Sok, quien hizo de su hijo, Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Sol de la nacion, abrio la nueva epoca del movimiento femenino de Corea y dedico toda la suya por el triunfo de la revolucion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicio militar EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicio militar EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el comandante de las tropas agresivas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y un general del ejercito titere del Sur de Corea quien es el subcomandante de la "comandancia de las fuerzas combinadas" surcoreano-norteamericanas tomaron por separado los cazas de las tropas norteamericanas y del ejercito titere y realizaron un "vuelo de mando" para examinar el "estado de operacion en el cielo y la capacidad de cumplimiento de la operacion combinada". Ellos fomentaron la psicosis de agresion al Norte de Corea visitando  reciprocamente las unidades de las fuerzas aereas de EE.UU. y del Sur de Corea.
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 21 y continua:
					
					  Esto es la maniobra para confirmar el perfeccionamiento de la "disposicion de operacion combinada" del Sur de Corea y EE.UU. destinada al ataque preventivo desde el aire en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana y fortalecer la cooperacion en la guerra agresiva contra el Norte de Corea.
					
					  Igualmente, es la provocacion militar imperdonable y el grave acto hostil al Norte de Corea.
					
					  La "alianza" de que hablan los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos es, en su esencia, la de guerra y la de agresion contra el Norte de Corea.
					
					  Si los imperialistas yanquis son las peligrosas fuerzas belicistas que persiguen la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y la provocacion de la guerra contra el Norte bajo el enganoso rotulo de la "paz" y "estabilidad", la banda de Lee Myung Bak es la horda de los vendepatrias imperdonables que sirven sin titubeo de los acolitos de la guerra nuclear de las fuerzas extranjeras obedeciendoles.
					
					  Para evitar la catastrofe es preciso eliminar su fuente.
					
					  El invencible disuasivo atutodefensivo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea frenara y frustrara tajantemente cualquier provocacion militar de las fuerzas belicistas internas y externas.
					
					  EE.UU. y la banda del traidor Lee deben saber bien que su provocacion militar contra la RPDC es el acto suicida igual que meterse en la boca del lobo, y abandonar el temerario alboroto militar.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela malsano objetivo de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela malsano objetivo de Japon
Pyongyang, 21 de abril (ATCC) -- Recientemente, Japon sometio a la reunion del Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU el "proyecto de resolucion" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que censura el "problema de DD.HH" de esta combinando el "problema de secuestro" con el particular.
					  Mediante ese proyecto trenzado de las falsedades e invenciones el pais isleno trata de calificar Corea del "delincuente de secuestro" para aislarla en la palestra internacional, evitar la liquidacion del pasado criminal y realizar bajo tal pretexto su ambicion de nueva agresion a Corea.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 21 y continua:
					
					  El verdadero delincuente del secuestro es Japon que en la primera mitad del siglo pasado perpetro los crimenes de arresto forzoso, secuestro y brutal asesinato contra los coreanos.
					
					  Hoy tambien, numerosos coreanos danados y muertos, quienes al ser arrestados, secuestrados y seducidos forzosamente por los imperialistas japoneses se vieron obligados al trabajo esclavista, la vida de esclava sexual de las tropas niponas y la carne de canon, no se olvidan todavia de las abominables atrocidades de estos imperialistas.
					
					  Aunque transcurrieron muchos anos, no podran encubrir ni borrar jamas tales crimenes.
					
					  Pero, hasta la fecha, Japon tan descarado no reconoce sus crimenes antieticos arriba mencionados ni pide disculpas por el respecto  y, al contrario, se vale de todos los medios para tergiversarlos y encubrirlos detras de la cortina de la historia.
					
					  Cuanto mas Japon habla tanto del "problema de secuestro" y "el de DDHH" de alguien, tanto mas se incrementara el odio del pueblo coreano a Japon.
					
					  Este pais isleno debe darse clara cuenta del sentimiento antijapones del pueblo coreano y cumplir cuanto antes su deber.
